title: SET_PLAYER_LOCKON
content:
0x5C8B2F450EE4328E0x0B270E0F// SetPlayerLockon
void SET_PLAYER_LOCKON(Player player, BOOL toggle);Parameters:player: The player ID to toggle the lock on for.toggle: Set to false to prevent lock on, set to true to allow for lock on.Used to toggle the square up aim.Examples:Lualocal plyId = PlayerId()
SetPlayerLockon(plyId, false)
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerLockon
void SET_PLAYER_LOCKON(Player player, BOOL toggle);

local player = source
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_LOCKON
SetPlayerLockon(player, true)
